public class TimelineIO.Index
extends java.lang.Object

TimelineIO.Index

public TimelineIO.Index(double setIdxIntervalInSeconds,
                        int setSampleRate,
                        long setInitialBytePosition)
Constructor which builds a new index with a specific index interval and a given sample rate

Parameters:
setIdxIntervalInSeconds - the requested index interval, in seconds
setSampleRate - the requested sample rate
setInitialBytePosition - the byte position of the first possible datagram (i.e., the position of the datagram zone)

feed

public int feed(long bytePosition,
                long timePosition)
Feeds a file position (in bytes) and a time position (in samples) from a timeline, and determines if a new index field is to be added.

Returns:
